TEXT.TITLE: COEUR D'ALENE MINES CORP <COUR> 4TH QTR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Shr loss 18 cts vs loss one ct Net loss 1,343,000 vs loss 49,000 Revs 6,778,000 vs 1,976,000 Year Shr loss 67 cts vs loss ten cts Net loss 4,693,000 vs loss 672,000 Revs 14.0 mln vs 7,034,000 Note: 1986 loss included one-time loss of 3,624,000 dlrs on write-off of certain silver, oil and gas interests.
